name: tm28
effect: Teaches Dig to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Dig to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text.diamond-pearl: The user burrows, then attacks on the second turn. It can also be used to exit dungeons.
flavor_text.platinum: The user burrows, then attacks on the second turn. It can also be used to exit dungeons.
flavor_text.heartgold-soulsilver: The user burrows, then attacks on the second turn. It can also be used to exit dungeons.
